name: Abomination Emblem
bonus: Unique The holder gains the Abomination trait.

name: Archangel's Staff
bonus: Each time the wearer casts their spell, they gain Spell Power equal to 45% of their max Mana. This bonus Spell Power affects the same cast it was gained from.

name: Archdemon's Staff
bonus: Each time the holder casts their spell, they gain maximum Health equal to 350% of their maximum Mana. The holder then heals for the maximum Health that was gained from that spellcast.

name: Assassin Emblem
bonus: Unique The holder gains the Assassin trait.

name: Banshee's Claw
bonus: When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain a shield that blocks the first enemy Ability.

name: Bloodthirster
bonus: Basic Attacks heal the wearer for 33% of the damage dealt. The first time the wearer would fall below 40% Health, they gain a shield equal to 30% max Health for 5 seconds

name: Blue Buff
bonus: Unique After casting their spell, the wearer's Mana is set to 20.

name: Bramble Vest
bonus: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal 80/100/150â˜… magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 seconds max).

name: Caustic Deathblade
bonus: Contributing to a kill grants +15 Attack Damage for the remainder of combat. This effect can stack any number of times (starting at 4 stacks). The wearer receives a penalty of -20% max health.

name: Caustic Quicksilver
bonus: Unique The wearer is immune to crowd control, but has 20% less max health.

name: Cavalier Emblem
bonus: Unique The holder gains the Cavalier trait.

name: Chalice of Malice
bonus: When combat begins, all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain 40 Spell Power for the rest of combat. The wearer loses 20 Spell Power.

name: Chalice of Power
bonus: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain 25 Ability Power for the rest of combat.

name: Coven Emblem
bonus: Unique The holder gains the Coven trait.

name: Dark Shroud of Stillness
bonus: Unique When combat begins, shoots a beam straight ahead of and behind them that delays affected enemies' and allies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana by 65% until they cast. Does not affect the holder.

name: Dawnbringer Emblem
bonus: Unique The holder gains the Dawnbringer trait.

name: Deathblade
bonus: Contributing to a kill grants +10 Attack Damage for the remainder of combat. This effect can stack any number of times (starting at 4).

name: Dragon's Claw
bonus: Grants 250 bonus Magic Resist (including components).

name: Dragonslayer Emblem
bonus: Unique The holder gains the Dragonslayer trait.

name: Eclipse Cape
bonus: Unique Every 1.5 seconds, a random enemy within 3 hexes is burned for 25% of their maximum Health over 10 seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced by 50%. The wearer is also burned for 2.5% of their maximum Health every second for 8 seconds.

name: Fallen Guardian Angel
bonus: Prevents the wearer's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After 2 seconds, they return with 70% Health and shed all negative effects. After this effect triggers, the wearer's Attack Speed is reduced by 50%.

name: Final Whisper
bonus: Unique When the wearer inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor and Magic Resist is reduced by 70% for 5 seconds. The wearer's Armor and Magic Resist are also permanently reduced by 25%.

name: Force of Darkness
bonus: Wearer's team gains +2 maximum team size but the player's Little Legends takes 100% extra damage.

name: Force of Nature
bonus: Gain +1 team size.

name: Forgotten Emblem
bonus: Unique The holder gains the Forgotten Trait.

name: Frozen Dark Heart
bonus: Unique All enemies within 2 Hex(es) have their Attack Speed reduced by 35%. Allies within 1 Hex(es) have their Attack Speed reduced by 35%. This does not affect the wearer.

name: Frozen Heart
bonus: Unique Reduces the Attack Speed of enemies within 2 hexes by 25%.

name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
bonus: The holder gains 18 Armor and Magic Resist for each enemy targeting them.

name: Gargoyle Stoneplate of Immortality
bonus: Every 2 seconds, the wearer heals themselves for 45 Health for each unit targeting them.

name: Giant Slayer
bonus: The holder's spells and basic attacks do 10% bonus damage. If the target has more than 1650 maximum Health, the bonus increases to 75%.

name: Guardian Angel
bonus: Prevents the wearer's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After 2 seconds, they return with 400 Health and shed all negative effects.

name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
bonus: Basic Attacks grant +6% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. This effect can stack any number of times.

name: Guinsoo's Sacrificial Rageblade
bonus: Basic Attacks grant +9% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat, but the wearer is dealt 2.5% of their maximum Health each attack. The bonus Attack Speed can stack any number of times.

name: Hand of Justice
bonus: At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer gains one of the following: +45 Attack Damage and Ability Power or Basic attacks and spells heal for 40% of damage dealt.

name: Hand of Vengence
bonus:
The holder begins combat with two buffs: +40 Attack Damage and +40 Spell Power; Basic Attacks and Spells heal for 40% of damage dealt
After each takedown, if the holder has these buffs, they lose them; if they do not, they get both buffs again.

name: Hellion Emblem
bonus: Unique The holder gains the Hellion trait.

name: Hextech Gunblade
bonus: The holder's spells heal them for 33% of the damage dealt. Excess healing fuels a shield that protects the holder against up to 300 damage.

name: Hextech Gunblade of Immortality
bonus: The holder's spells heal the ally with the lowest percent health for 60% of the damage dealt. This heal cannot effect the holder.

name: Infinity Edge
bonus: Unique The user gains 75% Critical Strike Chance (including base components). Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% is converted to 0.5% Critical Strike Damage.

name: Ionic Dark-Spark
bonus: Enemies and allies within 2 hex(es) are zapped when they cast an ability, taking magic damage scaling with their max Mana. Enemies take 200% of their max mana, and allies take 50% of their max mana. Whenever an ally or enemy is zapped, the wearer gains 10 Ability Power for the rest of combat.

name: Ionic Spark
bonus: Enemies within 2 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 50% (does not stack). When they cast a spell, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to 250% of their max Mana.

name: Ironclad Emblem
bonus: Unique The holder gainst the Ironclad trait.

name: Jeweled Gauntlet
bonus: The holder's spells can cause critical hits, and holder gains +40% Critical Strike Damage.

name: Last Whisper
bonus: Unique When the wearer inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor is reduced by 70% for 5 seconds. This effect does not stack.

name: Legionnaire Emblem
bonus: Unique The holder gains the Legionnaire trait.

name: Locket of the Iron Solari
bonus: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks 300/350/450â˜… damage for 8 seconds.

name: Locket of the Silver Lunari
bonus: When combat begins, the holder and all allies with 2 hexes in the same row gain 60 bonus Armor and Magic Resist, but gain 5 less Mana per attack.

name: Morellonomicon
bonus: Unique When the holder deals damage with their spell, they burn the target, dealing 25% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

name: Mor-evil-lonomicon
bonus: Unique When the holder deals magic damage with their spell, the spell deals 50% less damage but they burn the target, dealing 100% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 25 seconds, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

name: Nightbringer Emblem
bonus: Unique The holder gains the Nightbringer trait.

name: Quicksilver
bonus: Unique: The wearer is immune to crowd control for the first 12 seconds of combat.

name: Rabadon's Caustic Deathcap
bonus: The holder gains 125% additional Ability Power. The holder receives a penalty of -20% Max Health.

name: Rabadon's Deathcap
bonus: The holder gains 50 additional Ability Power.

name: Rapid Deathcannon
bonus:
Increases the holder's Attack Range by 1 hex. Additionally, the holder gains +40% bonus Attack Speed when there are no enemies within 2 hex.
The holder's attacks can no longer miss.

name: Rapid Firecannon
bonus: Increases the wearer's Attack Range by 1 hex and grants 20% bonus Attack Speed. The wearer's Basic Attacks can no longer miss.

name: Redeemed Emblem
bonus: Unique The holder gains the Redeemed trait.

name: Redemption
bonus: The wearer radiates an aura to allies within 1 Hex, healing them for 20% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. Allies affected by the aura take 25% reduced damage from area-of-effect attacks.

name: Refracted Bramble Vest
bonus: Grants 200 bonus Armor (including components).

name: Refracted Dragon's Claw
bonus: Reduces incoming magic damage by 15%. Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits.

name: Renewer Emblem
bonus: Unique The holder gains the Renewer trait.

name: Revenant Emblem
bonus: Unique The holder gains the Revenant trait.

name: Riskthirster
bonus: Basic Attacks heal the holder for 40% of the damage dealt. The holder takes 25% of their maximum Health in true damage at the beginning of combat. Each time the holder heals to 90% Health, they gain 40% Attack Speed for 4 seconds (does not stack).

name: Runaan's Hurricane
bonus: Basic Attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 75% of the wearer's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects. These bolts can critically strike.

name: Runaan's Untamed Hurricane
bonus: Basic Attacks fire bolts at 2 nearby enemies, dealing 50% of the wearer's Attack Damage. These bolts can critically strike but do not apply on-hit effects.

name: Sacrificial Gauntlet
bonus: The holder gains 40% Critical Strike Damage, and magic and true damage from their Ability can critically strike. The first time the holder casts their Ability each combat, they gain an additional 20% Critical Strike Chance for the remainder of combat (this bonus is also applied to the first Ability cast). Each time the holder casts their Ability, they deal 100% of max Mana multiplied by Star Level to themselves as true damage.

name: Sacrificial Infinity Edge
bonus: Unique Grants 75% Critical Strike Chance (including components). Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes +1% Critical Strike Damage. The holder also gains 30% Critical Strike Damage. Each time the holder attacks or casts their Ability, they take true damage equal to 3% of their max Health.

name: Sacrificial Redemption
bonus: The wearer radiates an aura to all allies on the board, and heals them for 25% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. Each time this happens, the wearer damages themselves for 5% of their current health as true damage.

name: Shroud of Stillness
bonus: Unique When combat begins, shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana by 35% until they cast.

name: Skirmisher Emblem
bonus: Unique The holder gains the Skirmisher trait.

name: Spear of Shojin
bonus: The holder's basic attacks restore 5 Mana on-hit.

name: Spectral Giant Slayer
bonus: The holder's Abilities and attacks do 50% bonus damage if the target has more than 1100 maximum health.

name: Spectral Spear of Shojin
bonus: The holder's basic attacks restore an additional 14 Mana on-hit. The holder deals 15% less damage.

name: Spellweaver Emblem
bonus: Unique The holder gains the Spellweaver trait.

name: Statikk Shiv
bonus: Every third Basic Attack from the wearer deals 70 magic damage to 4 enemies. Critical strikes from this effect reduce the targets' Magic Resist by 50% for 6 seconds.

name: Statikk Stiletto
bonus: Every other Basic Attack from the wearer unleashes a chain lightning, dealing 70 magic damage to 4 enemies. The lightning can critically strike, dealing bonus damage and reducing the target's Magic Resist by 50% for 6 seconds. The wearer recieves a penalty of -33% Attack Damage

name: Sunfire Cape
bonus: At the start of combat and every 2.5 seconds thereafter, a random enemy within 2 hexes is burned for 25% of their maximum health over 10 seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced by 50%.

name: Thief's Gloves
bonus: At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer equips 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level (consumes 3 item slots).

name: Titan's Resolve
bonus: When the wearer takes damage or inflicts a critical hit, they gain 3 Attack Damage and Ability Power. Stacks up to 25 times, at which point the wearer gains 25 Armor and Magic Resistance, and increases in size.

name: Titan's Revenge
bonus: Every 3 seconds, the holder's next attack deals 20% of the total damage they have taken since the last empowered attack as true damage.

name: Trap Claw
bonus: Blocks the first enemy spell that hits the wearer, and stuns the spell's caster for 4 seconds.

name: Trickster's Glove
bonus: Consumes 3 Item Slots At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer equips 2 temporary items. These Items are always full shadow items.

name: Turbulent Zephyr
bonus: Unique When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 8 seconds. The wearer also banishes themselves for 3 seconds.

name: Unstable Zz'Rot Portal
bonus: When the wearer dies, a Construct with 500 Health arises to continue the fight. When it dies it deals 500 true damage to enemies within one hex. Unstable Zzâ€™Rot Portal that arise from summoned units are 50% effective.

name: Very Dark Blue Buff
bonus: Unique After casting their spell, the wearer's Mana is set to 15. If the wearer has less than 60% health, this is increased to 50.

name: Warmog's Armor
bonus: Grants 1000 bonus Health (including components).

name: Warmog's Sacrificial Armor
bonus: Grants 1800 bonus Health (including components), but the wearer loses 60 Health each second.

name: Zeke's Bleak Herald
bonus: When combat begins, the holder reduces the Attack Speed of all allies within 1 hexes in the same row by -20% Attack Speed. The holder then gains +40% Attack Speed for each affected ally.

name: Zeke's Herald
bonus: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain 25% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

name: Zephyr
bonus: Unique When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds. This effect pierces CC immunity.

name: Zz'Rot Portal
bonus: At the start of combat, the wearer taunts enemies within 2 hexes for 1 second. When the wearer dies, a Construct with 1500/2250/3000 (Scales with Stage) Health arises and taunts all nearby enemies again. Zzâ€™Rot Portal Voidspawns that arise from summoned units are 25% effective.
